name: files
label: Video files
description: Supported formats are webm, mp4 and ogv.

name: fitToWrapper
label: Fit to wrapper
descriptions: Adjust video size to use available space

name: controls
label: Enable controls
description: Controls allow the user to for instance pause the video

name: autoplay
label: Enable autoplay
description: With autoplay the video starts to play immediately. If autoplay is disabled the user presses a play button to start the video.
